title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the autonomous combat vehicle, including functional, non-functional, and performance requirements, as well as legal, ethical, and safety considerations. Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards. Involve subject matter experts, military personnel, relevant stakeholders, and a multidisciplinary team comprising backend developers, frontend developers, security specialists, database specialists, DevOps engineers, and QA testers in the requirements gathering process.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, communication protocols, and integration with existing systems.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation System
description: Implement the algorithms and software components for autonomous navigation, including path planning, obstacle avoidance, and terrain mapping.

title: Implement Target Identification and Tracking
description: Develop the computer vision and machine learning algorithms for identifying and tracking potential targets in real-time.

title: Develop Coordinated Operations with Human Soldiers
description: Implement the communication protocols and interfaces for coordinating the autonomous combat vehicle with human soldiers on the ground.

title: Design User Interface and Control Systems
description: Design the user interface and control systems for human operators to monitor and override the autonomous systems when necessary.

title: Implement Security and Cybersecurity Measures
description: Develop and implement robust security measures to protect the autonomous combat vehicle from cyber threats and unauthorized access.

title: Develop Testing and Validation Strategies
description: Define and implement comprehensive testing and validation strategies for the autonomous combat vehicle, including simulations, field tests, and compliance with relevant standards and regulations.

title: Establish Deployment and Maintenance Processes
description: Define and implement processes for deploying, updating, and maintaining the autonomous combat vehicle in the field, including remote monitoring and support.

title: Develop Technical Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation and training materials for the autonomous combat vehicle, covering its operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
